schema.title: AbstractCollaborationLifecycleEvent
schema.description: An event in the lifecycle of a CollaborationProject containing references to the CollaborationProjectCollections involved at the time of the event.

EventID.title: EventID
EventID.description: A unique identifier of this event element in a sequence of events as, e.g., in CollaborationProject.

DateTime.title: Date and Time
DateTime.description: The date and time of the event.

Remark.title: Remark
Remark.description: A user defined remark associated with this event.

ResourceCollectionID.title: Resource Collection ID
ResourceCollectionID.description: The relationship to a CollaborationProjectCollection containing the System of Record resources used by the project.

WIPResourceCollectionID.title: WIP Resource Collection ID
WIPResourceCollectionID.description: The relationship to a CollaborationProjectCollection containing the Work in Progress resources published in the context of the project.
